Name: Sands
About the game: Key Features: A short story driven adventure about a survivor in the middle of desert planet. Beautiful graphics that convey the atmosphere of the game. A variety of puzzles, encounters with dangerous enemies and fascinating investigation. Find out what happened to the planet after the global catastrophe!
